document.full_text: justin turner had the answer to some high inside pitches when he hit a two-run double and a three-run homer in the mets' 7-2 victory over houston.
document.title: mets 7, astros 4: turner, the second baseman come lately, breaks out
lines_and_colors: justin turner had the answer to some high inside pitches when he hit a two-run double and a three-run homer in the mets' 7-2 victory over houston.
